title: Modal Theme Picker Implementation

overview.goal: Replace theme card grid with modal-based theme picker for better scalability and customization
overview.rationale: Current card grid works for 5 themes but doesn't scale well. Modal provides dedicated space for theme exploration and future features (filters, search, favorites).
overview.user_benefit: More intuitive theme selection, better previews, ready for personalization features

issues: Cards use flex: 1 which causes inconsistent sizing

### Changed
- **Theme Selection UI Enhancement**

  - Added large theme previews (120x80px) showing background, surface, text, and tint colors

step_9_git_commit.commit_message:
Replace theme card grid with modal picker UI

Enhanced theme selection with modal-based picker for better scalability and user experience:

New Components:
- ThemePickerModal: Full-screen modal with theme gallery
- ThemeCard: Individual theme cards with large previews (120x80px)

Settings Page:
- Replaced 5-card grid with compact selector button
- Button shows current theme with color preview dots
- Tapping opens modal for theme selection

Modal Features:
- Large visual previews showing bg, surface, text, tint
- Light/Dark preview toggle
- 2-column grid (mobile) / 3-column (desktop)
- Selected theme indicator with badge
- Smooth slide-up animation

Benefits:
- Scalable to 20+ themes (ready for Phase 2/3)
- Better visual previews
- Cleaner settings page
- Ready for filters/search/favorites
